author: jimmychu0807
content:
Hi all, what cli tool/cmd should I use to decompress the consensus-spec-tests `ssz_snappy` file to `ssz` file?  My purpose is then to feed it in https://simpleserialize.com/ to inspect the actual block / state data.

I have tried `szip` and `snzip` , but they don't see the consensus-spec-tests ssz_snappy files as in compressed snappy format.

author: jimmychu0807
content: End up using python-snappy (https://pypi.org/project/python-snappy/) + thin wrapper script works for me.
